bioconda.name: pysradb
bioconda.summary: Python package for retrieving metadata and downloading datasets from SRA/ENA/GEO

biocontainers.name: pysradb
biocontainers.summary: Python package to query next-generation sequencing metadata and data from ncbi sequence read archive.

biotools.summary: Python package to query next-generation sequencing metadata and data from NCBI Sequence Read Archive.

bioschemas.name: pysradb
bioschemas.summary: Python package to query next-generation sequencing metadata and data from NCBI Sequence Read Archive.

galaxy.summary: pysradb allows to retrieve metadata, such as run accession numbers, from SRA and ENA based on multiple criteria.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Python package to query next-generation sequencing metadata and data from NCBI Sequence Read Archive.
